column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Bethany - Thank you for your great review. I'm glad you enjoyed your experience with us
column2: and we appreciate your kind words. In the coming months
column3: we plan to open more locations in the greater Houston area
column4: which we hope will alleviate some of the wait times at Midtown. Otherwise
column5: on behalf of our entire staff
column6: we thank you for your patronage
column7: and we look forward to serving you again soon!
